profile_summary:
As a results-oriented Senior Sales Engineer with extensive experience in technical presentation and customer engagement, I excel in delivering value-driven presentations that resonate with clients. My proficiency in communicating complex technical concepts ensures clarity and fosters stronger relationships. Leveraging my background in internet security, I possess a deep understanding of security protocols including **HTTP**, **SMTP**, **DNS**, and hold certifications like **Security+**, **SSCP**, **CISSP**, and **CEH**. 

With 8 years as a Full Stack Developer, I have cultivated a strong technical foundation using modern technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My expertise encompasses **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, backed by cloud proficiency in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, grounded in robust systems architecture, CI/CD automation, and adherence to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
